columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the event was recorded

columns.name: AzureResourceId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the Azure resource associated with the process

columns.name: AwsResourceName
columns.description: Unique identifier specific to Amazon Web Services devices, containing the Amazon resource name

columns.name: GcpFullResourceName
columns.description: Unique identifier specific to Google Cloud Platform devices, containing a combination of zone and ID for GCP

columns.name: ContainerImageName
columns.description: The container image name or ID, if it exists

columns.name: KubernetesNamespace
columns.description: The Kubernetes namespace name

columns.name: KubernetesPodName
columns.description: The Kubernetes pod name

columns.name: KubernetesResource
columns.description: Identifier value that includes namespace, resource type and name

columns.name: ContainerName
columns.description: Name of the container in Kubernetes or another runtime environment

columns.name: ContainerId
columns.description: The container identifier in Kubernetes or another runtime environment

columns.name: ActionType
columns.description: Type of activity that triggered the event. See the in-portal schema reference for details.

columns.name: FileName
columns.description: Name of the file that the recorded action was applied to

columns.name: FolderPath
columns.description: Folder containing the file that the recorded action was applied to

columns.name: ProcessId
columns.description: Process ID (PID) of the newly created process

columns.name: ProcessName
columns.description: The name of the process

columns.name: ParentProcessName
columns.description: The name of the parent process

columns.name: ParentProcessId
columns.description: The process ID (PID) of the parent process

columns.name: ProcessCommandLine
columns.description: Command line used to create the new process

columns.name: ProcessCreationTime
columns.description: Date and time the process was created

columns.name: ProcessCurrentWorkingDirectory
columns.description: Current working directory of the running process

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: User name of the account

columns.name: LogonId
columns.description: Identifier for a logon session. This identifier is unique on the same pod or container between restarts.

columns.name: InitiatingProcessId
columns.description: Process ID (PID) of the process that initiated the event

columns.name: AdditionalFields
columns.description: Additional information about the event in JSON array format
